de.mrapp.android.preference.activity

Interface PreferenceHeaderDecorator


  • public interface PreferenceHeaderDecorator
    Defines the interface, a class, which should be able to modify the visualization of preference headers, must implement.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onApplyDecorator(int position, PreferenceHeader preferenceHeader, View view, PreferenceHeaderAdapter.ViewHolder viewHolder)
      The method, which is invoked, when the decorator is applied to modify the visualization of a specific preference header.

    • Method Detail

      • onApplyDecorator

        void onApplyDecorator(int position,
                    PreferenceHeader preferenceHeader,
                    View view,
                    PreferenceHeaderAdapter.ViewHolder viewHolder)
        The method, which is invoked, when the decorator is applied to modify the visualization of a specific preference header.
        Parameters:
        position - The position of the preference header, which should be visualized, as an Integer value
        preferenceHeader - The preference header, which should be visualized, as an instance of the class PreferenceHeader. The preference header may not be null
        view - The view, which is used to visualize the preference header, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null
        viewHolder - The view holder, which contains the child views of the view, which is used to visualize the preference header, as an instance of the class PreferenceHeaderAdapter.ViewHolder. The view holder may not be null
